data.comment: The match is underway. Spezia have kicked-off.
Spezia have been awarded a corner by Alessandro Prontera.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Spezia.
Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Friuli.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 7, Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Spezia.
Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Udinese have a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Spezia in Udine.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Udinese.
In the minute 10, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Spezia needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
Alessandro Prontera awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Free kick for Spezia in their own half.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 17, Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
Daniele Verde gets his shot on target but fails to score for Spezia.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
In the minute 20, Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Udine.
In the minute 23, In Udine a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Udinese's Stefano Okaka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
In the minute 25, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alessandro Prontera signals a Spezia throw-in in Udinese's half.
Kevin Lasagna (Udinese) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Spezia.
In Udine Udinese's Kevin Lasagna is caught offside.
Free kick for Spezia in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 29, Goal! Spezia take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Andrey Galabinov.
That's a fine assist from Emmanuel Gyasi.
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in Spezia.
Free kick Spezia.
Spezia's Alessandro Deiola breaks free at Stadio Friuli. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
Spezia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alessandro Prontera awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Udinese in the half of Spezia.
Claudio Terzi (Spezia) has received a yellow card from Alessandro Prontera.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Friuli.
Udinese's Kevin Lasagna gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Spezia defender.
Udinese have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In Udine a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Alessandro Prontera blows against Spezia's Andrey Galabinov for offside.
In the minute 45, Udinese's Kevin Lasagna has run offside.
Alessandro Prontera will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 45, Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Udinese kick-off.
In the minute 46, Udinese's Mamadou Coulibaly is whistled for offside at Stadio Friuli.
Alessandro Prontera signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Spezia's area.
Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 48, Hidde Ter Avest for the home team is judged to be offside.
Juan Ramos is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Spezia's half?
In the minute 50, Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spezia's half?
Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Ramos is back on the pitch.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Spezia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team have replaced Alessandro Deiola with Paolo Bartolomei. This is the first substitution made today by Vincenzo Italiano.
Can Spezia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
In the minute 53, Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Alessandro Prontera awards Spezia a goal kick.
Alessandro Prontera awards Udinese a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Emmanuel Gyasi of Spezia is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 56, The home team replace Martin Palumbo with Fernando Forestieri.
Attention is being given to Spezia’s Daniele Verde and play has been suspended briefly.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Alessandro Prontera.
In the minute 59, Kevin Lasagna (Udinese) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Spezia goal kick.
Spezia’s Daniele Verde is on his feet again at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Spezia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 61, Spezia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Udinese.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jeroen Zoet.
In the minute 63, Vincenzo Italiano (Spezia) is making a second change, with Rafael replacing the possibly injured Jeroen Zoet.
In the minute 64, Udinese to take a throw-in in Spezia territory.
Ilija Nestorovski is replacing Stefano Okaka for the home team.
Udinese make their third substitution with Thomas Ouwejan replacing Marvin Zeegelaar.
Kevin Lasagna of Udinese smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 65, Free kick Udinese.
Claudio Terzi has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
It seems as if Daniele Verde is unable to continue. Diego Farias replaces him for the away team.
Tommaso Pobega is on a sub for Giulio Maggiore for Spezia.
In the minute 67, The away team replace Emmanuel Gyasi with Martin Erlic.
Udinese drive forward but Thomas Ouwejan is judged offside.
Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Friuli.
In the minute 69, Alessandro Prontera awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Alessandro Prontera awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 72, Throw-in Udinese.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Spezia just outside Udinese's area.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 75, Udinese's Ilija Nestorovski is whistled for offside at Stadio Friuli.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Spezia's half?
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Spezia.
In Udine Udinese attack through Rodrigo De Paul. The finish is off target, however.
Spezia have a goal kick.
In the minute 78, Ryder Matos is on a sub for Samir for Udinese.
Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Udinese.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Udinese in the half of Spezia.
Spezia's Salva Ferrer has been booked in Udine.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Spezia in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Spezia at Stadio Friuli.
In Udine a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Udinese's Rodrigo Becao attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 84, It's a goal kick for the away team in Udine.
Free kick Udinese.
In Udine, Ilija Nestorovski (Udinese) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Spezia at Stadio Friuli.
Free kick for Udinese in the half of Spezia.
Juan Ramos (Spezia) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 87, Alessandro Prontera signals a Udinese throw-in in Spezia's half.
Alessandro Prontera signals a free kick to Udinese.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
In the minute 89, Can Udinese capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Kevin Lasagna (Udinese) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Udine Udinese drive forward through Thomas Ouwejan. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Spezia in their own half.
Spezia needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
In Udine, Ilija Nestorovski (Udinese) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Free kick Udinese.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Diego Farias (Spezia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Spezia extend their lead to 0-2 through Andrey Galabinov.
Great play from Rafael to set up the goal.
